snippet.title: Return To Castle Wolfenstein Walkthrough Tides of War - Part 4 ( Ancient Ruins ) Xbox
snippet.description:
wolfenstein the new order 2013 or 2014 ?
wolfenstein tides of war


Why watch my video guide?
This is an exclusive and unique video guide for the latest version of the PS2 game which I am doing now. Nowhere else will you find a better video guide for the PS2 console in Full HD resolution! Never again will recap the game. This is the latest video guide RtCW almost every platform architecture (PC, PS 2) Xbox ( for Microsoft my Xbox 360 ) and iPhone versions are not yet available for me.
In recent years 8 months ago I made ​​a new RtCW guide but only for the PC platform architecture. Now you have a unique opportunity to watch the PS2 version in action in the best picture quality. What I'm playing on the hardest difficulty possible. And also will seek out all secrets and will also improve tune improve my game spotavu: Blaskowitz. I hope that this game will not remain in obscurity and it still stays with us for at least one more decade! Good luck and have a nice entertainment viewers ,-)

- difficulty:  I am Death incarnate ( heaviest very Hard )
- 100% secrets all 2/2
- 100% treasure
- Almost every enemy
- Almost every book, note and clipboard read (pause to read yourself)
- Every cutscene
- Video HD 1920x1080 / Full HD 1080 max Quality /
- Plaform: PC ( 2001 ) - PS2 ( 2003 ) - Xbox ( 2003 )
- Video size: 2 GB, codec: H264


About the Game
World War II rages and nations fall. SS head Himmler has Hitler's full backing to twist science and the occult into an army capable of annihilating the Allies once and for all. Battling alone, you're on an intense mission to pierce the black heart of the Third Reich and stop Himmler -- or die trying. Fighting in advanced team-based multiplayer mode, you'll wage your own WWII in an all-out Axis vs. Allies contest for frontline domination.

Powered by the Quake III Arena engine, the Wolfenstein universe explodes with the kind of epic environments, A.I., firepower and cinematic effects that only a game created by true masters can deliver. The dark reich's closing in. The time to act is now. Evil prevails when good men do nothing.

This is also a precursor to the forthcoming year: Wolfenstein the new order
It will have the same success as RtCW?
